alert.note: Alert for Burnett (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 27 at 5:54PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN BURNETT COUNTY... At 553 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Branstad, or 15 miles east of Pine City, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported quarter sized hail in Grantsburg at 548 PM. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Grantsburg, Trade Lake, Branstad, Four Corners, Alpha, Falun, and Phantom Lake. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
